inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// failed request count by name in last 7d

let kubernetesNamespace = "integration-management";

let dataset=requests
    // additional filters can be applied here
    | where timestamp > ago(7d)
    | where client_Type != "Browser"
;
dataset
// change 'operation_Name' on the below line to segment by a different property
| summarize failedCount=sumif(itemCount, success == false and (iif(itemType == "request", (column_ifexists('customDimensions', '')["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace), (itemType == "request" and column_ifexists("id", operation_ParentId) in ((requests
    | where timestamp > ago(7d)
    | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
    | distinct id))) 
    or (itemType != "request" and operation_ParentId in ((requests
    | where timestamp > ago(7d)
    | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
    | distinct id)))))), impactedUsers=dcountif(user_Id, success == false and (iif(itemType == "request", (column_ifexists('customDimensions', '')["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace), (itemType == "request" and column_ifexists("id", operation_ParentId) in ((requests
    | where timestamp > ago(7d)
    | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
    | distinct id))) 
    or (itemType != "request" and operation_ParentId in ((requests
    | where timestamp > ago(7d)
    | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
    | distinct id)))))), totalCount=sum(itemCount)
    by operation_Name
// calculate failed request count for all requests
| union(dataset
    | summarize failedCount=sumif(itemCount, success == false and (iif(itemType == "request", (column_ifexists('customDimensions', '')["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace), (itemType == "request" and column_ifexists("id", operation_ParentId) in ((requests
        | where timestamp > ago(7d)
        | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
        | distinct id))) 
        or (itemType != "request" and operation_ParentId in ((requests
        | where timestamp > ago(7d)
        | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
        | distinct id)))))), impactedUsers=dcountif(user_Id, success == false and (iif(itemType == "request", (column_ifexists('customDimensions', '')["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace), (itemType == "request" and column_ifexists("id", operation_ParentId) in ((requests
        | where timestamp > ago(7d)
        | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
        | distinct id))) 
        or (itemType != "request" and operation_ParentId in ((requests
        | where timestamp > ago(7d)
        | where customDimensions["KubernetesNamespace"] == kubernetesNamespace
        | distinct id)))))), totalCount=sum(itemCount)
    | extend operation_Name="Overall")
| where failedCount > 0
| order by failedCount desc

inputs.name: Query
Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where customDimensions.KubernetesNamespace == "integration-management" and success == True
| where url has "/api/" and name !has "GET Warmup/Warmup"
| summarize Duration=avg(duration) by Endpoint=name
| order by Duration desc 
| take 10 
| render barchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where customDimensions.KubernetesNamespace == "integration-management"
| where success == True
| where url has "/api/" and not(url has "/warmup")
| summarize ResponseTime=avg(duration) by Timestamp=bin(timestamp, 10m) // use a time grain of 10 minutes
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where customDimensions.KubernetesNamespace == "integration-management" and success == True
| where url has "/api/" and name !has "GET Warmup/Warmup"
| summarize total_requests = sum(itemCount) by name
| top 10 by total_requests desc
| render barchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where ((operation_Name startswith "GET Images"))
| where resultCode != 200 and resultCode != 0
| project timestamp, name, url, resultCode, duration, performanceBucket, operation_Id
| order by timestamp desc

savedContainerState.partTitle: Failed Requests for "/Images" Ednpoints in Last 7d

content.PartTitle: Failed Requests for "/Images" Ednpoints in Last 7d

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where ((operation_Name has "stuf"))
| where resultCode != 200 and resultCode != 0
| project timestamp, name, url, resultCode, duration, performanceBucket, operation_Id
| order by timestamp desc
